channel.title: The Berky-Scape intro [Picture] firs page of it
channel.description:
Hey guys, take a look at this: I made it with Microsoft Powerpoint and I am planning to make an intro of it with Gta music and Credits. Would that be a good idea was my questions.
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/sd0bh4.jpg[/img]

The only reason people are saying they like this is because the only people who work on these servers are like 12, so no one makes any actually good content, especially not you.

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Berky-Scape, post:4, topic:336507”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=432876.msg3177547#msg3177547 date=1271006232]
this is a development of a picture…?
[/quote]

Intro from Berky-Scape, that i am going to make of the Gta san andreas intro music, based on Gta san andreas.

@Your Master
Thanks Repped back[/quote]

That is my favorite game. Good luck, and good work so far.

item.title: The Berky-Scape intro [Picture] firs page of it
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

[quote=“Berky-Scape, post:47, topic:336507”][quote author=Koolvin link=topic=432876.msg3183021#msg3183021 date=1271486124]

[quote author=edge® link=topic=432876.msg3182453#msg3182453 date=1271442792]

[quote author=Koolvin link=topic=432876.msg3182270#msg3182270 date=1271428562]

[quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=432876.msg3182088#msg3182088 date=1271397136]

[quote author=Koolvin link=topic=432876.msg3181715#msg3181715 date=1271371254]

I used powerpoint…
[/quote]And that is supposed to combat my opinion? How old are you? You post this as a representation of your skills yet this takes literally no skill at all… Anyone who can move a mouse and c/p could do that in 5 mins.

Wtf are you talking about this is the FIRST picture of my trailer, the whole trailer has movie in background just like the GTA san andreas trailer. Please ask or read before posting a whole damn post about my skills, did I ever see your releases? I don’t think so…
[/quote]If someone wanted me to look at a movie, and I say that as the first slide, I’d turn it off.

Please gtfo my threat, how old are you 12?
Gtfo please, go away with your sarcasm and flame, flame on someone else his topic.
You fucking noob.
[/quote]I’m not flaming, I’m giving my humble opinion.

Give a good comment or just leave ok?
[/quote]This isn’t russia buddy, everyone is entitled to their opinion, good or bad. Don’t act like you didn’t leave a comment on one of my posts saying ‘pathetic’.

well i know why he left that comment! cause you are pathetic koolvin…

You are obviously less than 14 years of age.

[quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=432876.msg3182476#msg3182476 date=1271445487]

[quote author=edge® link=topic=432876.msg3182453#msg3182453 date=1271442792]

[quote author=Koolvin link=topic=432876.msg3182270#msg3182270 date=1271428562]

I used powerpoint…
[/quote]And that is supposed to combat my opinion? How old are you? You post this as a representation of your skills yet this takes literally no skill at all… Anyone who can move a mouse and c/p could do that in 5 mins.

Wtf are you talking about this is the FIRST picture of my trailer, the whole trailer has movie in background just like the GTA san andreas trailer. Please ask or read before posting a whole damn post about my skills, did I ever see your releases? I don’t think so…
[/quote]If someone wanted me to look at a movie, and I say that as the first slide, I’d turn it off.

Please gtfo my threat, how old are you 12?
Gtfo please, go away with your sarcasm and flame, flame on someone else his topic.
You fucking noob.
[/quote]I’m not flaming, I’m giving my humble opinion.

Give a good comment or just leave ok?
[/quote]This isn’t russia buddy, everyone is entitled to their opinion, good or bad. Don’t act like you didn’t leave a comment on one of my posts saying ‘pathetic’.

well i know why he left that comment! cause you are pathetic koolvin…

Waha xD
Dude I left that cuz you did on mines, doesn’t matter I won’t post on your topic anymore then if you don’t want me to. I am not waiting to…

I can’t even tell if this makes sense…

You are obviously an idiot.
I know you don’t have something to say. Keep it that way[/quote]

Agree’d

Very epic barkey.
